original_text: He travelled towards Damascus. He was very near the city when a bright light suddenly appeared. The light came from the sky, and it shone all around him.
korean_text: 사울이 길을 가다가 다메섹에 가까이 이르더니 홀연히 하늘로부터 빛이 그를 둘러 비추는지라

sentences.original_text: He was very near the city
when a bright light suddenly appeared
The light came from the sky
and it shone all around him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 빛은 그의 주위를 모두 비췄습니다
